languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт невозмутимо пожимает плечами.{/n} "Умерь свой пыл, элантах. Думаешь, так бы я стала разведывать твои секреты? Нет. Я лишь от скуки исследовала нутро сталекрылой птицы, неуклюжей и уродливой, но все же несущей нас сквозь тьму, звезды и глубины варпа. Я не предполагала, что это твоя обитель, пока не попала внутрь".

{n}Yrliet shrugs her shoulders, unfazed.{/n} "Curb your ire, elantach. You think I would attempt to scout out your secrets like this? No. I have merely been exploring the belly of the steel-winged bird — as ugly and awkward as it may be, it is nevertheless carrying through the darkness, the stars, and the depths of the warp. I had no idea this was your dwelling until I entered it."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт невозмутимо пожимает плечами.{/n} "Умерь свой пыл, элантах. Думаешь, так бы я стала разведывать твои секреты? Нет. Я лишь от скуки исследовала нутро сталекрылой птицы, неуклюжей и уродливой, но все же несущей нас сквозь тьму, звезды и глубины варпа. Я не предполагала, что это твоя обитель, пока не попала внутрь".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet shrugs her shoulders, unfazed.{/n} "Calm down, elantach. You think I would try and scout out your secrets like this? No. I have just been exploring the belly of a bird with steel wings, ugly and awkward, but it is still carrying us through the darkness, the stars, and the warp's depths. I did not expect this to be your dwelling until I got inside it."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet shrugs her shoulders, unfazed.{/n} "Calm down, elantach. You think I would try and scout out your secrets like this? I did not expect this to be your dwelling until I got inside it."

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特毫不在意地耸了耸肩。{/n}“学会控制你的愤怒，外界人。你以为我会这么明目张胆地来刺探你的秘密？不，我只是在探索钢翼鸟的肚子。尽管它看上去又丑又笨，却能在无尽的黑暗、群星与亚空间深处翱翔。在进来之前，我都没意识到这是你的房间。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shrugs her shoulders, unfazed.{/n} "Curb your ire, elantach. You think I would attempt to scout out your secrets like this? No. I have merely been exploring the belly of the steel-winged bird — as ugly and awkward as it may be, it is nevertheless carrying through the darkness, the stars, and the depths of the warp. I had no idea this was your dwelling until I entered it."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特毫不在意地耸了耸肩。{/n}“学会控制你的愤怒，外界人。你以为我会这么明目张胆地来刺探你的秘密？不，我只是在探索钢翼鸟的肚子。尽管它看上去又丑又笨，却能在无尽的黑暗、群星与亚空间深处翱翔。在进来之前，我都没意识到这是你的房间。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet se encoge impasiblemente de hombros.{/n} «Contén tu ira, elantach. ¿Crees que intentaría husmear en tus secretos de este modo? No. Simplemente he estado explorando el vientre de este pájaro con alas de acero; por feo y tosco que es, aún logra transportaros a través de la oscuridad, las estrellas y las profundidades de la misma disformidad. No he sabido que esta es tu morada hasta que he entrado en ella».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shrugs her shoulders, unfazed.{/n} "Curb your ire, elantach. You think I would attempt to scout out your secrets like this? No. I have merely been exploring the belly of the steel-winged bird — as ugly and awkward as it may be, it is nevertheless carrying through the darkness, the stars, and the depths of the warp. I had no idea this was your dwelling until I entered it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet se encoge impasiblemente de hombros.{/n} «Contén tu ira, elantach. ¿Crees que intentaría husmear en tus secretos de este modo? No. Simplemente he estado explorando el vientre de este pájaro con alas de acero; por feo y tosco que es, aún logra transportaros a través de la oscuridad, las estrellas y las profundidades de la misma disformidad. No he sabido que esta es tu morada hasta que he entrado en ella».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Imperturbable, Yrliet hausse les épaules.{/n} « Calmez-vous, elantach. Croyez-vous vraiment que je m'y prendrais ainsi si je voulais vous espionner ? Non, je me contentais d'explorer les entrailles de l'oiseau d'acier. Il a beau être laid et étrange, il nous permet de braver les ténèbres et de voyager à travers les étoiles et les profondeurs du Warp. Je ne savais pas que vos appartements étaient ici avant d'y entrer. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shrugs her shoulders, unfazed.{/n} "Curb your ire, elantach. You think I would attempt to scout out your secrets like this? No. I have merely been exploring the belly of the steel-winged bird — as ugly and awkward as it may be, it is nevertheless carrying through the darkness, the stars, and the depths of the warp. I had no idea this was your dwelling until I entered it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Imperturbable, Yrliet hausse les épaules.{/n} « Calmez-vous, elantach. Croyez-vous vraiment que je m'y prendrais ainsi si je voulais vous espionner ? Non, je me contentais d'explorer les entrailles de l'oiseau d'acier. Il a beau être laid et étrange, il nous permet de braver les ténèbres et de voyager à travers les étoiles et les profondeurs du Warp. Je ne savais pas que vos appartements étaient ici avant d'y entrer. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet zuckt unbeeindruckt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Zügelt Euren Zorn, Elantach. Denkt Ihr, ich würde Eure Geheimnisse auf diese Weise ausspähen? Nein. Ich habe nur das Innenleben des Stahlflügelvogels erkundet – so hässlich und ungelenk er auch sein mag, gleitet er doch immerhin durch die Dunkelheit, die Sterne und die Tiefen des Warp. Ich wusste nicht, dass das Eure Wohnstatt ist, bis ich sie betrat."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shrugs her shoulders, unfazed.{/n} "Curb your ire, elantach. You think I would attempt to scout out your secrets like this? No. I have merely been exploring the belly of the steel-winged bird — as ugly and awkward as it may be, it is nevertheless carrying through the darkness, the stars, and the depths of the warp. I had no idea this was your dwelling until I entered it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet zuckt unbeeindruckt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Zügelt Euren Zorn, Elantach. Denkt Ihr, ich würde Eure Geheimnisse auf diese Weise ausspähen? Nein. Ich habe nur das Innenleben des Stahlflügelvogels erkundet – so hässlich und ungelenk er auch sein mag, gleitet er doch immerhin durch die Dunkelheit, die Sterne und die Tiefen des Warp. Ich wusste nicht, dass das Eure Wohnstatt ist, bis ich sie betrat."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは肩をすくめ、平然としている。{/n}「怒りを抑えるんだ、エランタ。我がお前の秘密を詮索するとでも？まさか。我はただ鋼鉄の翼を持つ鳥の腹の中を探検していたに過ぎない。醜く、不格好であっても、これは暗闇を、星々を、歪みの深淵を進む。ここに足を踏み入れるまで、ここがお前の住居だとは知らなかったのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shrugs her shoulders, unfazed.{/n} "Curb your ire, elantach. You think I would attempt to scout out your secrets like this? No. I have merely been exploring the belly of the steel-winged bird — as ugly and awkward as it may be, it is nevertheless carrying through the darkness, the stars, and the depths of the warp. I had no idea this was your dwelling until I entered it."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは肩をすくめ、平然としている。{/n}「怒りを抑えるんだ、エランタ。我がお前の秘密を詮索するとでも？まさか。我はただ鋼鉄の翼を持つ鳥の腹の中を探検していたに過ぎない。醜く、不格好であっても、これは暗闇を、星々を、歪みの深淵を進む。ここに足を踏み入れるまで、ここがお前の住居だとは知らなかったのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, umursamazca omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Öfkene hâkim ol elantach. Sırlarını böyle ortaya dökeceğimi mi düşünüyorsun? Yapmam. Sadece çelik kanatlı kuşun gövdesini keşfediyordum. Çirkin ve tuhaf bir şey olsa da seni karanlıklarda, yıldızlarda, öteboyutun derinliklerinde gezdiriyor. İçeri girene kadar buranın senin odan olduğunu bilmiyordum."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shrugs her shoulders, unfazed.{/n} "Curb your ire, elantach. You think I would attempt to scout out your secrets like this? No. I have merely been exploring the belly of the steel-winged bird — as ugly and awkward as it may be, it is nevertheless carrying through the darkness, the stars, and the depths of the warp. I had no idea this was your dwelling until I entered it."

Çirkin ve tuhaf bir şey olsa da seni karanlıklarda, yıldızlarda, öteboyutun derinliklerinde gezdiriyor. İçeri girene kadar buranın senin odan olduğunu bilmiyordum."
